class.name: BaseDecompositionBlock64

javadoc.text: Generic interface for wrapping a {@link BlockMatrix64F} decomposition for * processing of {@link org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F}.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

method.name: decompose
method.comment: doing an in-place convert is much more memory efficient at the cost of a little
convert it back to the normal format if it wouldn't have been modified
